plot outline: 'Oye Ninne' charts the story of Vishnu (Bharat), a young man who aspires to be a farmer while his parents want him to aim for something big. He grows up with his cousin Veda (Srushti Dange), whom he shares a love-hate relationship. For Vishnu, she's that "annoying cousin" everyone has in a family; whom your parents love more than you. Vishnu's father believes he's good-for-nothing, but will that change?
title: Oye Ninne
plot: '_Oye Ninne_ (qv)' charts the story of Vishnu (Bharat), a young man who aspires to be a farmer while his parents want him to aim for something big. He grows up with his cousin Veda (Srushti Dange), whom he shares a love-hate relationship. For Vishnu, she's that "annoying cousin" everyone has in a family; whom your parents love more than you. Vishnu's father believes he's good-for-nothing, but will that change?
